actions.description: The regisaur makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack. The regisaur can't target the same creature with both attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 47 (6d12 + 8) piercing damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the regisaur can't Bite another target.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

specialTraits.description: The regisaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
